This is a proprietary browser and does not support Adobe Flash.  When contacting Samsung, I get no good answer other than just "Samsung web browser does not use all formats."  As asked, "Why"?  No answer can be given.  So if you want to watch sports on NBC Sports "Live Events", then forget it. I hope that Samsung will develop software add ons that will support Adobe or either make consumers aware before a purchase is made.  I stated this to a Samsung rep and his respond was "I understand as I am a consumer too." Maybe a bit picky on my part but this is what reviews are about.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Infiniti Lover
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with my new TV. In fact I am pleased with the entire purchase and delivery by Amazon. Had never bought something as large and expensive as this and had it delivered this way. Was not sure how it would work? It came right on time to my front door. Packaging was in good shape with only one hole in it. But when I removed the smaller box that actually contained the TV from the larger box, there was not a mark on the inner box. Loved the packaging material of tiny cardboard pieces to pad instead of horrible foam peanuts too! I bought a Samsung Blu-ray player and sound bar for this TV too. I am happy to report that I set up the entire system by myself with no problems at all. I am not a techie at all. But it is very simple and pretty much "plug and play". We do not pay the extra the cable company charges for HD service and I was not sure what kind of picture we would get on this TV. It is spectacular! I don't need the HD service. I love, love love my new Samsung TV. The picture is great and with the Samsung sound bar adding to the sound feature I feel like I am at the movies! Have not watched 3D on it yet? This was a new TV for the bedroom and now I really enjoy curling up in my big chair to watch TV at night there. I feel like I got a great product at a great price. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Good tv but remote battery life is terrible!
Reviews.Author: JOS, Chicago
Reviews.Content: Update.  I am still extremely happy with my TV. Good pic and sound. However, I have had this tv since early November, and I already had to replace the batteries THREE TIMES. How crazy is that, AND I have to say that I don't really use the tv remote, I use the remote for the cable tv, I actually only use the samsung tv remote to switch 'modes' so I can use Apple TV, and that's not very often!  Obviously the better it's are being 'used' 24 x 7, even if you are not actually using the remote.  This is totally ridiculous and I'm really annoyed that Samsung can build such a great tv and then make such a stupid design fault......

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: Writing my review on this screen, which was delivered this morning. The picture is fantastic on Bluray, Netflix, video games, etc. I find the natural setting on the picture to be my preference. I upgraded from the 55" 7000 series from 2009 and am very happy with the new screen. Still need to give the 3D a try, but I highly recommend this set if you're a picture buff.- One tip is that the stand on this TV is wide legs on each end, about 66" apart, so you may not be able to fit it on your existing stand. I had to order a wall mount. No big deal, but a worthwhile note.Checking back four months later...still epic and worth every penny. I love this TV and it looks great on the wall.

Reviews.Title: What's your excuse? Buy Now!
Reviews.Author: The Shadow Warrior
Reviews.Content: This TV has been in my household for nearly a year and it is just amazing how awesome this TV is! Clearly it is a Smart HDTV which means it is not like your average HDTV. This behemoth comes with built-in Wifi, a wonderful SmartHub Menu, a camera mounted onto the top of the TV and much more!However, I must warn you, times have changed when I got this TV and wrote my review. It appears that most models DO NOT come with a HD camera mounted on the TV according to the picture. Please keep that in mind. My model had integrated Skype as well. I cannot tell you much about this portion, but I can GUARANTEE that it is not even important compared to the awesome power this TV has to offer.If you ever feel that your Smart TV is getting outdated by the newer Smart TV's in Samsung's arsenal, don't worry about it too much. The most amazing part of this TV is that it has a slot for an Evolution Kit. This kit automatically upgrades your TV to the latest dashboard, and installs all of the new features that current-gen Smart TV's offer! Now note that the Evolution Kit does not come supplied with your TV and you may have to pay 100-300 dollars to grab one. If you think about it, I would rather pay a few extra hundreds rather than spend 2000 dollars on a new TV altogether.The Wifi is what makes this TV an awesome entertainment center. This unlocks all the features in the Smart Hub menu. The smart hub menu is easily accessed on the Samsung remote they provide you. It's the button in the shape of a diamond with a vast amount of colours. Once a Wifi connection has been established, you can enjoy some awesome apps such as Youtube, Fitness Center, and even Angry Birds! Another cool feature is that the TV has an IR blaster that is placed on the bottom of the TV and it senses your movement. So pretty much to play Angry Birds, you just swipe your hand and watch the Carnage.Please keep in mind that if this TV does not come with a camera then this feature may not apply, but it seem that it has been implemented in a whole new way.You will also have the benefit to watch 3D movies, and what better way to experience your first glimpse of 3D with its personal 3D template video. It also comes with 4 3D glasses as well as an HDMI cable.What are you waiting for? There is no excuse to not buy this TV and even if two of the previous features I mentioned are obsolete at this point, by the time I have written this review, This HDTV is by far the best one you can have and I have had no problems with it whatsoever. Take my word for it, You'll be the envy of people during the Super Bowl =)

Reviews.Title: Samsung should improve its operating system!
Reviews.Author: Mostafa Beshkar
Reviews.Content: The operating system on this TV is really bad. The picture quality is nice, but my family and I are fed up with the slowness of the apps. The all-share app (for mirroring) does not work with PCs or Apple computers.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: A. Appel
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time with plenty of packaging to protect TV.  Very sharp picture with a user friendly remote.  I would recommend this TV to anyone who wants a 3D.

Reviews.Title: Oh, the possibilities!
Reviews.Author: G. Davis
Reviews.Content: This TV is so cool.  You can do so many things with it.  It has a ton of apps.  Lots of options to connect.  The picture is great and you can see it anywhere you sit.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Edward Zinn
Reviews.Content: This unit is beyond what I expected. I highly recommend this TV to anyone comparison shopping. Youwant this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Bo Jiang "Rain"
Reviews.Content: Simply an amazing tv. Love the remote and it's very responsive.Had a bad run with it's predecessor 46" which broke just after 2 years when the warranty ran out.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: C. Davis "new mom"
Reviews.Content: Easy set up, great picture, watched a movie on netflix almost instantly. Remote is cool with the little touchpad but it is kinda small so you'll have to keep track of it or you'll lose it. I still need to go through the manual and make the adjustments that were recommended by other reviewers.

Reviews.Title: Great TVs
Reviews.Author: Cajunsmiley
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these one for my bedroom and one for my son's room. Again a huge plus is the network applications with these sets

Reviews.Title: Travel Trailer TV
Reviews.Author: Errol W. Severns
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung UN40F6400 40-Inch 1080p 120Hz 3D Slim Smart LED HDTV because of the very slim profile. I only had 3" of clearance in my trailer. It fit perfectly and the picture is fantastic. I wish I could get rid of all the Bling, who needs it in a trailer (no internet).

Reviews.Title: UNREAL!!!
Reviews.Author: B Weekes
Reviews.Content: This set has the most amazing picture. I was highly skeptical of the 3d, but figured, why not try it? I watched Escape From Planet Earth in 3d and was absolutely blown away. Forget all the ambiguous specs and 50 page reviews. Just buy it and enjoy.

Reviews.Title: TV constantly turns on and off
Reviews.Author: Lance10 "Lance10"
Reviews.Content: Buyer beware.TV constantly turns on and off rapidly until you unplug the TV. This is a known issue, refer to your local search engine and search "samsung tv turns off by itself". Severely disappointed with the TV, replaced it with my original Toshiba 40" LCD I purchased three years ago which worked fine and still does. Samsung missed the mark, paying 2x the cost doesn't get you 2x the quality, it appears to get you half.

Reviews.Title: 3 Strikes and your Out
Reviews.Author: David Bergert
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to like this TV but was plagued by either quality and /or delivery issues.This would of been my 5th Samsung LCD TV.Strike 1:  TV was ordered and delivered - when unboxed and presented by the delivery team - there was a 3-4 inch Bar - distorting the picture horizontally - I refused Delivery.Strike 2:  TV was replaced prompted by Amazon's excellent customer service, and delivered the next week - During the day during the unboxing the TV looked good and was accepted. During the evening during Evening Viewing - there was a terrible flashlighting issue on the TV - I've attached a picture of this. a huge circular blue/white glow on the black screen.  I shared a picture with Amazon, and was offered a return or refund. I choose to try another chance.Strike 3: TV was shipped the next week, and the strike 2 one was boxed - however during unpacking the delivery folks noticed a crack in the LCD screen, I refused delivery, and sent both back. Called Amazon and after confirming that the TV's were at the delivery company - issued a refund.I'm not sure if TV's of this size 65" are more susceptible for shipping damage, but I've chosen to do a refund for now and might consider a local store or alternative brand, however I was really excited for this TV. But am currently a bit burned out of the process and luck with this 65" Samsung model.

Reviews.Title: Refresh rate constantly failing
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: In general I think this is a great tvBut you expect the quality to be the same as what you payed for.This tv may have 120hz refresh rate but you will see that failing constantlyBetter to pay more and get the 240hz which is more slimmer and better tv

Reviews.Title: Like it very much
Reviews.Author: kv
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a smart tv. Happened to see this series and was within the budget I had and I like it.

Reviews.Title: Out of box experience problamatic, TV all I had hoped for so far
Reviews.Author: SteveG 60 "A Central VA reader"
Reviews.Content: My TV was delivered 90 minutes ago.  The enhanced delivery was a whirl wind as they came in, put the box down on the floor, took the top of the box off and were asking where to plug it in before I had a chance to look at anything.  They didn't set it up, they just took the upper box off and left it standing in the packaging.  Plugged it in, said, yep it works, here is your remote, sign here, and they were out the door.Then, when I went to set it up, I took it out of the packaging, laid it on the floor and found the stand.  But not the screws for the stand.  Nowhere to be found.  Check the directions, and they should be attached to the packaging.  Again, no where to be found.  Called Samsung.  24:38 later, I have given extensive information and filed a service claim so that the screws can be shipped to me, UPS ground in 3-5 days with another 3-5 days for delivery. Oh, that is after I send them proof of purchase.  I guess there are folks stealing screws.  Anyway, I mentioned that they might want to overnight them, since this is a big expensive TV, and they might want to treat a customer well.  I then got the "sorry, nothing I can do".  To which I replied, sure you can.  I bet Samsung uses Fed Ex all the time, they just choose not to here.  To her credit, she agreed with me.  Now we will see how long until the screws arrive.Amazon to the rescue.  Called Amazon tech support even those this wasn't a technical issue.  Sure enough, they knew the screw size, told me I could pick it up at any hardware store, and they would call back in 2 days and credit me the cost.  What a difference in customer support between Amazon and Samsung! Quick trip to Home Depot and I was all set.Automated set up program was quick and intuitive.  Smart controller takes a little getting used to, but I think it is going to be much faster scrolling through movies and the like.  I have the other controller on another TV and I like it, but I think I am going to grow to like this one better.Remote synched to my set top box with no problem. TV menu page now gives me preview scenes and a guide page.  Internet menu page has apps like a tablet.  Logged into my Netflix page and was looking at my queue in no time.I have read of others tuning the picture.  So far, colors are vivid, picture is sharp, and it has the liquid look like you can reach right into the picture at times. And this was out of the box. Found myself counting the gray hairs in the male leads beard at one point.  Haven't watched sports like hockey yet which will be the real test.  But so far, I have no need to adjust anything.TV gets 5 stars, knocked down one for shipping without screws and the abysmal customer service.

Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: Kerron Ramganesh
Reviews.Content: this is a great item for the value, super display and the right size for my needs. I would recommend this to anyone interested

Reviews.Title: good picture, but support and features seriously lacking
Reviews.Author: Non sequitur
Reviews.Content: Commercials for this TV imply that it will learn your viewing habits and make recommendations.  In practice, not so much.  Multiple calls to customer service later, I'm still not sure what the deal is, but it seems all of the "smart" features only work if you are viewing through Samsungs OWN version of "netflix" where you PURCHASE content from Samsung.  So if you watch cable/satellite TV, or Netflix, you are going to be SOL, rendering your TV "not-smart" (aka "dumb").My other complaint is that my Dish satellite receiver and on-screen guide are incompatible with the TV.  Dish is not exactly a "mom and pop" operation, and it is ridiculous that Samsung does not even keep a list of which receivers do and do not work with it's remote/smart Tv.  Terrible customer support.  Again, NONE of the "smart" features seem to work.One useful thing support told me: "we don't guarantee compatibility with any non-Samsung devices".  Well you know what: I just bought a top-of-the-line Samsung 3D bluray DVD player, and it doesn't work with the "smart" either, so nice job.So buy the TV for its size, not its features, which you should just ignore entirely as noise.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Product Received
Reviews.Author: Ronda Giblin
Reviews.Content: I ordered a "used" one from Amazon with a few scratched on the back.  What I got was one that has apparently been dropped and the front screen had popped out.  Haven't been able to find a replacement for the same amount.  The price has increased.  They took it back just fine and were great about it, but they didn't offer to "replace" it.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Toys
Reviews.Author: Joycelyn Edwards
Reviews.Content: This is my pride and joy especially when my football and basketball games are on. "This is my DO NOT DISTURB" time.

Reviews.Title: Gearing up for my second Samsung service appointment...
Reviews.Author: Grafpaper
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: Samsung repair happened and was relatively painless. They replaced the panel with a new one... no more green line. I have since noticed that there is an area of uneven backlighting (a band running from the top to the bottom of the screen that is lighter than the rest of the screen). Trying to determine how annoying this actually is before calling Samsung again to set up yet another repair appointment. Not particularly thrilled at the moment.Prior to the appearance of a vertical green line of dead pixels, the TV was working great. Huge improvement over the ~5 year old Samsung 46" that I had, particularly the black levels.I wasn't super thrilled about the Smart TV features before I bought this TV as I have a WD HD Live box that I typically use, but the built-in features on this TV put that box to shame. Netflix/Spotify/HBO Go all work great... the inclusion of HBO Go is huge.The remote is kind of gimmicky... not sure why I need a touch pad when a four way directional pad would suffice.Now to the bad part - after approximately one month of ownership, a vertical green line has appeared on my set. This green line is visible regardless of input as well as during power on/off. I contacted Samsung about this issue through their web site and haven't been thrilled with their support.After creating a Samsung account, registering my television, and filling out a detailed service request form (which ended up taking ~1 hour), I received a call from a Samsung rep on my office line on a Sunday afternoon (which I missed as I was not in the office). Upon missing this call, Samsung emailed me a link to a troubleshooting guide and closed my repair ticket (great!). I've just completed my second service request form and am waiting to hear back from Samsung. I have a feeling this isn't going to be the easiest repair process. Will update this review upon resolution of my service request.

Reviews.Title: Remote Confusion
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: Problem one: The remote control is not a typical one. It takes a lot of practice. Problem two: If you do not have experience with a smart TV there is a lot to learn, but the manual is insufficient. We have been very frustrated with this TV and although it can do many things (which is why we bought it) the most simple tasks such as turning on your favorite station to watch a show have become a task. I am hoping that with time and practice we can use it as easily as our regular TV.

Reviews.Title: Returning it
Reviews.Author: JLLi
Reviews.Content: So I purchased this item last month, at first it looks good, 50" and fits my living room perfectly. Great picture and the 3D feature is amazing, I liked it a lot. But only after a month of using it, this morning I found that there are two bright stripes, one white and horizontal, the other green and vertical, right in the middle of my screen when I turned the tv on. I didn't hit it with anything, it just happened out of the blue. I read some comment about how poor samsung's customer service is, and I notice today is my last day of free return (Lukily, caught it on time), so I called customer service immediately, since it is a problem with defected product, the customer service was very friendly and help me to request the process immediately. So overall, great service from amazon, it's just I'm unlucky and some quality issue with samsung, considering if I want to go with samsung at all this time when getting another one.

Reviews.Title: Quality hitting rock bottom
Reviews.Author: Ehab Fikry
Reviews.Content: I have been buying samsung TVs for more than 10 years now. Good product, reasonable price and excellent features. But lately the quality has been deteriorating and along with it the after sales support.I bought this new 75" and the next day got a dead pixel (permanent red pixel). Contacted Samsung and they sent someone over to take pictures, test ..etc. 2 weeks later they call and say that the TV has a defect and all they can do is change the panel.Buying a new TV and needing to fix it the very next day is just wrong. I was already disappointed that it had a defect, the least I would expect was a replacement. My expectations were much higher for such a big brand.My advice: When they install it, dont let them leave till you make sure you check every inch of the screen with dark room lighting on a black/dark picture.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, dumb tv
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: If you're only interested in good picture quality, this tv does a decent job.Pros:Decent picture qualityCons:The volume is incredibly soft.  If you don't have a sound system, expect to buy one to use with this television.It's hard to do anything besides change the channel and volume with the remote.  The one app that I use frequently is youtube, and the remote that comes with it makes it almost impossible to use.  Want to jump a video ahead, good luck!The default picture settings make the picture quality look horrendous.  Expect to spend 10 minutes playing with the settings to get a decent picture.

Reviews.Title: So far, as amazing as anticipated
Reviews.Author: Y. Melich
Reviews.Content: My in-laws purchased an older version of this TV over a year ago and the reason I selected this model, was that everytime I saw an older movie on theirs, I was very impressed with the definition. At one point, an older BW movie was so good, I thought it was a remake. That said, we're very happy with the quality and definition of this TV. The Smart TV aspect is also very good, allowing you to download many apps and I don't think I've even learned 1/2 of what it can do.Watching a blu-ray disc on this TV is absolutely incredible! Almost too good; some of the CGI stands out more but that's overshadowed by the feeling that at times, it feels like your watching a live action play instead of a TV. There are times the people appear to be in the room with you. Very impressive!

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Steven H Cole
Reviews.Content: This is the clearest and most user friendly tv we have ever owned! The smart is really smart we love it.

Reviews.Title: kaypound
Reviews.Author: kola
Reviews.Content: Stunning picture....but sound is just fair without a connection to a HToverrall its a fantastic TV.3D images are on point

Reviews.Title: The perfect & convenience Samsung Smart TV!!
Reviews.Author: Park T.
Reviews.Content: I was surprised when it delivered to my home.Becasuse it has many function for viewer.(Internet,WI-Fi,3D,LED and new smart remote control)Samsung Smart TV is the best TV in the world!!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Ovi Rozario
Reviews.Content: When I received this t.v. I was happy I had no problem with it so far its been a month.

Reviews.Title: Clear quality
Reviews.Author: amandalynn lane
Reviews.Content: I love the quality of the picture and interractive features, although I recommend you get some help setting it up if you are not tech savy.

Reviews.Title: Headline
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Cross
Reviews.Content: Like the TV. It is better then expected. The same is not true for the remote that comes with it. There is a steep learning curve, and even when learned, the remote comes up lacking..The 3D is better then expected.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with the purchase but the price could have  been lower.
Reviews.Author: Ayaz Lakdawala
Reviews.Content: Web browser for the TV is slow. Some times TV automatically turns off. Picture quality is good. Sharp display available. Really frustrating mouse pointer and keyword typing capability. Samsung should provide the wireless  keyboard with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: eliezer quesada
Reviews.Content: Turn the picture is very sharp the TV is very easy to use very nice format and the apps are easy to use

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: William R Swindells
Reviews.Content: All good: timely delivery, easy set up, great pic. The remote is a little too clever. No number pad. But, it talks to the cable box without any programming. Very convenient.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Malpheos
Reviews.Content: I gave this TV 5 stars due to how well it looks and performs. The remote control is really cool. I love the way it interacts with the TV. I had a 40" Samsung 60hz TV before and this is far and away better. The 3D part of it is kind of cool to play with. If you are in need of a new TV then this 6400 series offers a good bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Great price and TV
Reviews.Author: Jinks
Reviews.Content: Good experience with TV. Been a samsung TV customer for  afew years now and this was a great addition to the loft....

Reviews.Title: A SMART TV that's way smarter than me....
Reviews.Author: SkeeterUSA
Reviews.Content: ....which wouldn't take much, but it's nice to see quality and precision in a single unit.  I haven't even begunto learn all the myriad of features, but I'll discover those as I need them.  It's nice to know this technology "cup"is always full.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: E. Pfeiffer
Reviews.Content: I wanted a great picture  and got it with this TV.  I ordered it on 12-2. It arrived in great shape and set up flawlessly. Picture wasstunning.  The "smart" portion of the TV isn't of great use for us as we like our computers. The touch pad portion of the remoteis geared to a younger audience.  Clearly however we really like this TV.

Reviews.Title: It's a Samsung
Reviews.Author: C. Flores
Reviews.Content: So far so good, Tv has worked excellent have been watching netflix on it so far. My only grip so far is I can hear something still working on the TV when it is switched off I assume it's the wifi working, but it has to be dead quite to really hear it and I have to be close to the TV, so it's really not noticeable unless you are looking for it.

Reviews.Title: We LOVE IT!  Hands down the absolute BEST TV we've ever owned!
Reviews.Author: Barbie
Reviews.Content: Hands down the absolute BEST TV we've ever owned, bar none!  The sharpest picture ever, bright colors, and super skinny frame.  We love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: Therrell D. Luke
Reviews.Content: Of all of the televisions that I have considered, this Samsung 75 inch is the best.  I replaced a Samsung 60 inch with this because of my experience with this previous model.  Both have outstanding pictures.  I watch quite a bit of sports and with the clarity and size of this set, it is like being at the games, in some ways better.  I have not utilized all of its features yet but those that I have used are well worth the price that I paid.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 65-inch smart led hdtv
Reviews.Author: Odessa
Reviews.Content: I was truly surprised at how fast I got this delivery.  In addition, the delivery people brought it inside and had planned to mount it but I was not prepared for them due to painting.  After 4 days I had it hung on the wall and it works like brand new.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV with good media support
Reviews.Author: kdog
Reviews.Content: I used the built in apps for a while until I got a roku player.  They are fine but a bit clunky and slow.  Picture quality is awesome and makes streaming content look amazing.  I also love the fact that samsung supports just about every video codec out there which means I can play a ton of videos directly off a hard drive.

Reviews.Title: Just what we wanted
Reviews.Author: William T. Beaudry
Reviews.Content: Works great as our bedroom TV.  Clear picture, good features and a useful remote; however but the Wi-FI reception seems weak

Reviews.Title: Great TV !
Reviews.Author: Kumar
Reviews.Content: a bit expensive but worthy every penny.This is my first 3D tv and I completely love it.I got free keyboard too which works perfectly fine except for few sites.Only thing needed to improve is samsung app store.

Reviews.Title: Nice Flat Screen
Reviews.Author: Ken Byrnes
Reviews.Content: it's a fine tv amazing picture and does lots of things.  Lame manual, very difficult to access all the features since there isn't any manual to point them out.  the e-manual is absurd.

Reviews.Title: There are better HDTVs for the money!
Reviews.Author: WJW
Reviews.Content: Due to the Samsung reputation this is my first purchase of a Samsung TV. I use this TV in my bedroom. The picture quality is good but the design could have been much better!  First, the foot stand takes up quite a large space and doesn't look that great, I called Samsung to inquire if another foot stand would fit, Samsung's answer was to use the foot stand that came with the TV. The TV can be wall mounted. Second, the only control on the TV itself is the power button which is stupidly located on the back of the TV, without the remote control there is no control of the TV.  If you connect a keyboard and mouse which I have done there is some control but cumbersome. Third, the remote control is too super sensitive, just reaching for the remote and touching the touch pad can make a video you are watching, for example from Amazon, scroll to another location in the video, quite annoying! I have two other TVs that out perform this Samsung TV, a VIZIO TV and a Toshiba TV.  I feel I paid way too much for the Samsung TV but dummy me threw the box away, feeling the Samsung TV would be a quality product that I wouldn't have to return, I was wrong . The 3D quality is nowhere near that of my VIZIO TV, which really is not that much of a factor for me since I do not watch very much 3D content, but since you may watch more 3D content I have commented on the 3D performance here. Programming the remote control, for example removing the annoying beeps when controlling the volume, is not that user friendly. Bottom line, there are much better HDTVs out there for a much better price.  I definitely do not recommend purchasing this TV, no one deserves this headache of a TV!

Reviews.Title: The 50 inch is a good compromise size
Reviews.Author: Gregg Greenwood
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for a little over a month now. Really nothing to complain about. I'm pleased with the 50 inch size being available. 45-46 seemed a little too small but 55 seemed too big for my living room.I like the fact that the screen isn't super reflective. Some TV's I looked at in person were practically mirrors.As you would expect from a Samsung, lots of brightness. I've played around with all the settings and finally have it where I like it. We watched the Blu Ray of Skyfall and it was wonderful. And we watched the 3D version of Avatar in Blu Ray as well. Another amazing show of the TV's abilities.I paid too much because I wanted it as soon as it was available. But Amazon gave me a $200 price match after the fact and that just made it even better.

Reviews.Title: Horribly slow browser and processor
Reviews.Author: Flat Lander
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for a few weeks now and I am not very impressed.  We bought this tv with the intention of "cutting the cable cord".  I was assuming I could mirror or push anything from my laptops or iphones or ipads.  This might be possible but I have spent way to many hours online looking for a way to do this.  Samsung Chat told me you can't mirror or send streaming video from a website on your laptop to the TV and he said he doesn't know anything about Apple devices.  I wasn't overly interested in sending any content to the TV until I tried to use the browser in the TV.  It is HORRIBLY SLOW!!!  My original iPhone 4 is 4 - 10 times faster at loading pages then the TV is.  I went to do a speed test at speedtest.net and my iPhone comes in around 10mbs and the tv at 25mbs but it is sooooo much slower than my phone let alone my laptop.  It is so slow its pretty much unusable.  I can't even believe they can still make things this slow, I'm sure my thermostat in my house has more computing power than this TV.We watch alot of online tv shows like Big Bang from CTV.ca or Hulu via an IP blocker (in Canada) as well as other shows off other sites and this TV is completely useless for this.  I am trying to buy and Apple TV off of Kijiji and download Airparrot so I can mirror from my laptop or idevices.  Defeated the purpose of getting a smart tv.  I would have been better with a Roku and or Apple TV and or Chromecast.  If you did get a tv show to load on a website it will continually need to buffer.The TV picture is good and the smart remote with the track pad built in is great and the keyboard on the tv is really great at suggesting letters right next to the one you clicked and suggesting whole words.  I have the samsung remote apps which are junk for controling the TV.  Only issue with the smart remote is there isn't pause/FF/stop on it, you need to hit another button to bring up a menu.  Also missing an enter button.Overall the TV is good as a tv or if you just want to watch Netflix and youtube but if you want to watch streaming video from a website the TV isn't going to do what you want.  If you want the smart features and already have a tv I would suggest Roku or Apple TV or Chromecast.

Reviews.Title: WOW~!@@ you have to be kidding me~!@@@@
Reviews.Author: Dennis J.
Reviews.Content: I did weeks of research on smart TVS. I looked at the blogs on every company and model to see which had issues and how they are handles. NO company works well with the public especially with something new like Smart TVs. I selected this model based on what I read and I've been very satisfied. It's like the new autos because it has so many different items that you associate with a TV. I'm educated but getting this hooked up correctly and to the right COUNTRY was a challenge. The ONE call I made to correct my mistake to Samsung was corrected within a few minutes. The quality is there. The pricing was right. Yes, it has 3D and people say it has no future BUT it does have a strong past. Buy it and be prepared to experience the change of what the vision in electronic viewing is all about.

Reviews.Title: Poor operating system
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: It has so many options that i had to fight like 1 week to have the colours that i like, also the apps are always crashing, it has options that doesn't work, for example i can not see my pictures in dropbox, and there is an option for dropbox. The apps to take control from my iphone and samsung tablet don't find the TV. And when you open the apps is very very slow

Reviews.Title: Do your homework first!!!
Reviews.Author: rdail
Reviews.Content: The TV and smart TV functions are excellent.  However, before purchasing make sure that Samsung supports your cable provider.  It does not support mine, therefore the ON TV functions are not available to me, disappointing since this is the major reason I purchased this model.  I'm trying to find out how to remedy the problem, but so far the only solution is to change cable providers.  Not satisfactory since U-Verse, DISH, or Direct TV are not as good as our local provider

Reviews.Title: Great function for the cost
Reviews.Author: Charles Sheen "Boss Hog"
Reviews.Content: would have been a 5 star except the volume when showing NETFLIX and HULU movies is vere very low at times.Set it to 100 and still way to low. Forced to use earphones to hear audio.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ujrb
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a 40" TV  with edge to edge image with a narrow bezel. The UN40 fit the bill. Although not comparable to flagship F8000 aesthetically- for a 40" its pretty darn good ! Picture is amazing, sound quality better than I expected.

Reviews.Title: This item was purchased by my daughter
Reviews.Author: Bryce Pursley "Bryce"
Reviews.Content: She told me that she really likes this TV. She told me that she really likes the 3D capability of this TV and she has purchased several more 3D glasses.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: NorCal_7777
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV is incredible. HD images make it look like people are actually in the room with you. I replaced a 6 year old HD Plasma with this TV and can definitely notice a difference. Sports are great! Set-up was easy and the smart-features are a nice add-on along with the universal remote. 3D option is nice and the set comes with 2 pairs of glasses. Sound quality is fine. Would definitely recommend TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: pcleere1 "Reading is my favorite past time.  ...
Reviews.Content: We are enjoying the new HDTV.  Picture is clear and bright.  It has turned out to be a great purchase.  There is a lot of bells and whistles to learn about.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best TV I've ever had. I love the smart tv aspect and Netflix in particular. Fantastic picture, and sound.

Reviews.Title: Wifi is bad
Reviews.Author: Sibish
Reviews.Content: Screen quality is good, wifi is bad. Youtube crashed in the startup, still doesn't work. Bad software , need better controlhttp://sibbsnb.blogspot.com/2013/04/un55f6400-samsung-2013-series-review.html

Reviews.Title: Wrong product in Box.
Reviews.Author: Clifferd
Reviews.Content: Would not trust (Amazon Warehouse deals) again. Advertised that product was repackaged. That's OK.  When I received the Samsung TV  it was a UN40F6300 instead of a UN40F6400 a big difference! Missing hardware, missing owners manual, WRONG PRODUCT IN BOX. Called Amazon, they told me I had to pay for shipping back. UPS wanted $160 with insurance that was required. I payed $596.00 for this used wrong product, about the same price if it was new.  I have kept it for now. Not happy.

Reviews.Title: great TV for the price range
Reviews.Author: B. Pawlak "BrP"
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from an old Samsung plasma TV that finally died on me to this one.  I was worried that the black levels wouldn't be as good as I had hoped, but I was pleasantly surprised when I got the TV up and going.  I considered plasmas, but ended up with an LED to do something different.  As much as I would like the deeper blacks and more detail with the brightness down in dark scenes, this LED TV absolutely stands right with my old (keyword: old) plasma in that respect.This is my first 3D TV, but I have watched other (more expensive) 3D TV's that were easily double the cost of this one (2 years ago) and this is definitely as good in my opinion of the more expensive TV of a couple years ago.  There is always trade-offs with a cheaper TV, but Samsung packed a ton of features in the mid-range priced 3D smart TV.  The micro-dimming seems to work pretty well as I haven't been distracted much by dark scenes in the 4 or 5 blu rays that I have watched through it so far.  Playing Assassins Creed Black Flag on xbox one did cause me to have to turn the brightness and backlight up a little bit to see what I was doing in the very dark missions.Samsung smart hub works great on this TV and using for Netflix and Vudu mostly so far has worked fantastic.  Once you fine a happy medium with the automotion feature by using the 'custom' option,  you can make the picture smoother without having too much of the 'soap opera' effect.The TV came with a free HWF450 soundbar which seamlessly links to the TV via Bluetooth, so no wires between the two and all of my other devices play straight through the soundbar/subwoofer with no effort.  Screen mirroring with my galaxy s4 works mostly well, every now and again there is a hiccup, but nothing major.tl:drAll-in-all, this TV does absolutely everything that I need it to do and I'm glad that I upped my price range from the $800 area to this one, plus with the free soundbar promotion I could not pass it up and I have to say that I'm very pleased with my purchase.  There are better TV's out there, but they come with a premium and I cannot justify spending more on a television at this time.  If this is your price range, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: TV is good. Smart feature sucks.
Reviews.Author: VM
Reviews.Content: TV is good. nice HD TV but Smart feature sucks.Smart feature crashed so many times. Once crashed and deleted my installed apps. It hanged so many times.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Edward "Edward"
Reviews.Content: I have only had this TV for 2 days but I absolutely love it!  The picture clear, the high definition and 3D are great.  I'm still learning how to use the touch screen remote and the smart features of the TV.  As a computer, I'll stick to my laptop for now.  Navigating on the TV browser is cumbersome. Maybe a keyboard would help.  My bigest compaint is that my DVR remote won't sync up to the TV and my TV remote won't control the DVR.  I spent about an hour on the phone with Charter and got nowhere.  So I have to use 2 remotes.  Hopefully when I swap out my DVR for a newer model, I won't have this problem.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 65 inch
Reviews.Author: Karen Pariseau
Reviews.Content: This TV has got the most life like picture I've seen for a 65 inch. Colors are beautiful right out of the box. I had to return the first one that was sent because it had a "burn" like mark on the screen near the edge. Looked like it was smashed during the manufacturing process. But buying it through AMAZON, it was a zero hastle procedure. They sent out a new one right away. Don't hesitate to buy this TV.

Reviews.Title: Okay TV but . . .
Reviews.Author: M. Newman "Torah Addict"
Reviews.Content: I bought this 3D HD TV on Amazon on June 30, 2013 for two reasons.  I needed a high end 40" 3D HD TV and Samsung seemed to be the only one that had all the bells and whistles and was 40".  There were very few purportedly excellent 3D HD TV's that were 40" in size.  I inherited a very nice but old entertainment unit and the largest TV it could contain was a 40".  I already had a fantastic Sony 3D LED HDTV--which I would easily and wholeheartedly give 5 stars--for the past two years but it was only a 32" unit and Sony didn't have a 3D HD 40" TV.  After 32", their next size was slightly bigger than 40" and it wouldn't fit in the entertainment unit.Second, the reviews on Amazon for this Samsung TV were virtually all fantastic.  So I bought it.  Well, the quality is okay but it can't hold a candle to my Sony 32" TV.  Sure, it's bigger than my Sony and that's nice but the quality of the picture simply isn't as good.  Furthermore, the remote on this TV--and the promotional 3D blu-ray player--are beyond atrocious.  They are virtually unusable.  The engineers/designers at Samsung apparently have a different kind of hand than any human being in my family.  They make using the Samsung TV (and blu-ray player) an unpleasant experience.  Finally, the internet and other "smart" features of the TV are not as easy to use and well designed as Sony's and also cannot integrate well with my high end Yamaha RX-A1010 receiver like my Sony does so I have to use too many unusable remotes and click too many buttons (that you can't see in dim light or figure out where they are) to do simple operations.Oh, and there is one more thing which finally prompted my very first comment on a product I purchased on Amazon.com (and I buy EVERYTHING  on Amazon.com and have for over a decade) is that my TV began dying a little over a week ago and now it's dead.  It very quickly goes off and on, off and on, off and on, over and over again when you turn the TV on.  I've had this TV for less than 6 months and it's already broken.  I'm not happy.  Why oh why did I inherit an old (but great looking) entertainment unit whose maximum TV size was 40"?

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: RPG "RPG"
Reviews.Content: Ordering from Amazon was a pain, but it may not have been Amazon's fault. I think it was the UPS driver's decision not to leave the package at the door, but rather to require a signature. I've received flatscreen TVs before where they just left it, so I didn't expect this. Apparently Amazon needed to specifically waive the signature requirement.Setup was a breeze. The "chicken legs" are a bit ugly but the rest of the TV is nice-looking except  somewhat thicker than I expected. The TV is quite well calibrated out of the box if you choose Movie mode, and adjust the backlight according to your preference. (All the modes other than movie are grossly exaggerated and cartoonish.)The TV will control your cable box through an IR emitter, but I prefer to control both the TV and the cable box (and other stuff) through a universal remote. The touchpad remote is surprisingly easy to use, but it's not a universal remote, so it has gone into a drawer. However, I ordered and received a Samsung IR remote through eBay so that I could have my universal remote 'learn' Samsung remote commands from it. That's because the supplied remote is a Bluetooth remote. Playing video files from a USB hard disk works well although it sometimes has trouble with the sound format.Going from a smaller TV, this TV looks huge for 2D, but as soon as I switch to 3D it feels small. That's probably because I'm subconsciously comparing it to theaters. I don't like 3D on this TV, it feels strangely diorama-like. The glasses don't feel uniformly bright. I guess 3D is just a parlor trick for now anyway. There's not much to watch.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Annabel Perez
Reviews.Content: the tv that i received is not new, it's refurbished. and it arrived with the screen broken, unfortunately could not  to return it on time.

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: It is still to soon to have actually figured every thing out. Hopefully will have more time to dedicate to "play" with it. Thus far I am happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: great  TV
Reviews.Author: read carefully "read carefully"
Reviews.Content: I do not know much about the technical side of TVs and all of the metrics by which you should analyze a TV. All I know is that this looks great, it sounds great, it is fairly intuitive to use, and I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Gustavo
Reviews.Content: I put this tv in my bedroom and it looks great, not as big as I thought it would look in the room. It has a solid base that is attractive... picture quality is superb and has all the features you would expect in a modern led 3d tv!

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: cwb
Reviews.Content: TV is what we wanted. Love all the features. TV is a little hard to set up..But not a big issue.

Reviews.Title: good form factor, apps, and dlna support. picture, ui, and remote could be better.
Reviews.Author: Peter Ian Staker
Reviews.Content: due to the slim frame of these tvs, you can see some things that would otherwise be covered by a thicker frame: dark corners, edge bleeding at top and bottom. setting brightness too high is the only way they become blatantly obvious, so if you use default or ideal picture settings, its barely noticeable--but it is. but its something my old samsung doesnt have. aside from that, the picture is very nice, handling contrast a bit better than older models. plus the thin size is sleek but still allows for vesa mounting.the remote has a trackpad instead of the crosshair for directional inputs, making fast forward and rewind more of a chore, as you could hold down the button before but now have to keep swiping repeatedly to advance/rewind in spurts. also, i dont like that the remote has a built in microphone--paranoid. it is smaller and sleeker though, and my wife likes it.app selection is great. has netflix and amazon vod, along with a bunch of other popular ones, and a browser. a bit annoying though that you cant get to the apps in a single button press like with older models.dlna support is good, handling all types of video files. im not able to get thumbnails for videos for some reason, but that my be the media servers fault. an improvement to their old dlna is being able to search video timelines as the current video still plays.

Reviews.Title: great 55 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Sh3rman
Reviews.Content: This is the best tv for this size. Forget all the 1080p. 720p mumbo jumbo.  It shows great works great. Shows youtube from my ipad. Love it

Reviews.Title: Picture is great
Reviews.Author: Tunde T.
Reviews.Content: The picture of this TV is awesome. I had it mounted and looks beautiful from most angles. I've only had it for about few weeks and haven't tinkered with it as much. I do like the fact that the TV is self-aware of the attached connections. Such as turning on PS3 will automatically turn on the TV. Turning on the Samsung Bluetooth sound bar will automatically turn on the TV. Also, I only have to use the TV remote for almost everything. Gaming also looks great on this bad boy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: troopert
Reviews.Content: This TV surpassed my expectations in picture quality, easy of setup and not only the TV but the remote  I also obtaine the Samsung HW-F-450 2.1 Channel-Watt Sounbar and it even made a great product better.  Now I have great picture and sound.  I now hear sounds, such as footsteps that were never heard before  It brings reality to the whole TV viewing.  We watch Downton Abbey and I can not tell you how much a great program has been made more real, and the sounds of life being heard.

Reviews.Title: Amazon is the best place to shop,,,
Reviews.Author: William L. Dobsa "WLD"
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best TV's we have, and we sure have others,I can't wait to use the camera with this unit,,,

Reviews.Title: TV purchase review
Reviews.Author: John Baker
Reviews.Content: great picture and great features; delivered on time and very competitive price!  exactly as advertised; looks great in our living room, especially after upgrading from 32"

Reviews.Title: Samsung rocks
Reviews.Author: loveflorida
Reviews.Content: I am new to this tv.so far I love it. size and price are great.here you have some information about the Samsung 75" 6400 Series TV. It is a Full HD Smart 3D LED TV features a 2D/3D LCD panel with 1920 x 1080p Full HD resolution, slim LED backlighting and a Clear Motion Rate of 480 that promotes sharp detail and contrast - even when watching sports and action movies. The Wide Color Enhancer Plus feature further improves picture quality by allowing you to see the full RGB spectrum.  For flexible connectivity, this model offers four HDMI inputs and three USB ports that support ConnectShare Movie. This lets you play videos, music or photos from a USB drive without needing to use a PC.  Other connection options include a component input, a digital optical audio output and more.This TV features built-in Wi-Fi, a dual core processor for faster multitasking and a full web browser.  It also provides access to the Samsung Smart Hub and you can use the Wi-Fi to connect to a variety of entertainment apps and Smart TV features.  It supports home network AllShare connectivity with compatible devices as well.  Plus you can control all HDMI connected compatible devices with a single remote with Anynet+.  S-Recommendation is also available for voice communication with your Smart TV.  You suggest what you're in the mood for and the TV finds the programming for you

Reviews.Title: CLEAR AND SMART TV
Reviews.Author: M. A. King
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A GREAT SMART TV  GOOD SIZE FOR US IN A SMALL ROOMVERY CLEAR PICTURE  AVAILABLE FREE MOVIES (OLDER) ON CRACKLEGOOD SOUND TOO  HUSBAND LOVES THIS TV HE IS VERY COMPUTER SAVVYI JUST LIKE THE REGULAR TV NO CABLE AT OUR HOUSE WE WILL NOTGET STUCK WITH THOSE BILLS  GREAT BUY  I EVEN PAYED SHIPPINGRIGHT TO OUR DOOR FROM UPS

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV.
Reviews.Author: Santosh Geddamuri Sr. "Happysan"
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th tv in last 5 years. I keep replacing my TVs. Last one was Lg 47a7600.It was nice glossy 3d tv. I still miss the glossy screen. I should have gone with 8000 series for glossy screen.For price this is a awesome deal.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: some gun guy
Reviews.Content: came with a free blu ray and amazon refused to price match.  thats stupid.  tv picture is very nice.  some blur every now and then but still great.  i havent watched in 3d but im sure its great.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Sharon L. Meeks "Sharon L"
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for me and so far it seems to work well.  I've got it hung on the wall and it's beautiful!

Reviews.Title: Solid TV
Reviews.Author: L. Poletto "magicpro"
Reviews.Content: Just as advertised. This TV can bring it, but it is a bit expensive. Check out the Samsung soundbars that work with their TVs

Reviews.Title: Defective On Arrival - Dark band on the bottom
Reviews.Author: H. Bucher "PhD"
Reviews.Content: Just after TV arrived I sat to watch my favorite channels. Noticed right away a darker region on the bottom of the TV.Tried to update the software, picture, modes, etc to no avail.The test picture showed that the problem was with the TV itself, not cable.Very disappointing. How can I have confidence that this is not a recurring problem with this TV model?Thinking about returning it and exchanging for another brand.Update - called Samsung for support. They made an appointment to check it out "on a window between 8 and 12pm"!!! Missed work just to take care of this issue and... no show. I'm paying $1700 and get this sort of treatment. Bummer.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN40F6400
Reviews.Author: Neiser F. Dizon
Reviews.Content: I bought this UN40F6400AFXZA at Amazon, The first couple of days it was working great, the picture is outstanding even in 3D, but on the 3rd day it started to shut down (on and off) It was very annoying and very frustrating.  I called the tech support (very helpful) and they said it needed to be serviced.  I am so disappointed of the quality of the TV that I bought.  I love Samsung but this particular model SUCKS!!  I will not recommend this to anyone due to my recent experience.  In addition, the remote control is not very user friendly, the basic function like jump to previous channel and basic channel by the number is very time consuming.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Teja
Reviews.Content: Finally they shipped it, bought un50f6400 waited for 4 long weeks which was a pain but once I installed the TV and started browsing I felt its worth my money and wait, dual core processor is really a outstanding feature to talk about, its speed is awesome with smooth transition affects. Initially I was not excited by 3D feature for any TV but it is stunning experience. Remote is really good no more clumsy buttons. There are few issues with Netflix but not any showstoppers. I can recommend this TV to a friend.ps. wondering how to make smart hub work with my AV receiver, I have connected my tv through wireless internet connection, the input to tv is not going through my AV receiver for this reason I have to depend on TV speakers for sound, I'm looking for help here on how to make TV to connect to smart hub thorough my AV receiver. Any kind of help is appreciated. TIA.

Reviews.Title: AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Richards
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV since mid-February 2014 and must say that this is a huge disappointment. In the past I have bought SONY TV's & been happy with them but decided to go with Samsung this time due to the reputation they have & the features of this unit. Wow, did I make a mistake. While the picture quality is OK, I think that the SONY I bought my wife last year has a better picture. A plus over the Samsung that the SONY has is that the 3D glasses do not require batteries. I was looking forward to using the Samsung as a RVU TV but this is technology not ready for prime-time! I am getting error messages stating "This location is not authorized" or some other error denying my connection to the DVR in another room. Also, when these errors show up, which is ~ 1x/week now (!) the Samsung is sooo slow at changing inputs.Do yourself a favor. Stay away from this TV. This was my 1st Samsung TV. It will be my last!

Reviews.Title: NOT  as SMART as advertised !!! SLOW System operation! (weak hardware)
Reviews.Author: Varall
Reviews.Content: 3 stars is my symmary of All features and qualities of the tv. After 2 weeks of heavy usage (bout it cyber monday)  here is my review:Picture:  4  stars (out of the box the gamma and colours are worst than a 10 years old TFT screen! after tunning gets better)Audio:  4  stars (well from slim tv one can not expect much becouse of fisical limitations. that is why im not giving it 2 stars)Hardware:  2 stars. ( dont be fooled by the "DUAL CORE PROCESSOR". its really slow...slower than a 5 years old blackberry. now the facts:  it takes 35-45 seconds for the you yube application to load  and 45sec-1 min for Tunein radio to load. this is loooong  time. Memory is about  1.7 GB - 224 mb pre-loaded apps and functions and about 1.4 GB free. my calculator has more memory than that!)Software  : 2 stars. Now here I can lose 1hour but ill be short. Browser is a joke-I have accounts in some paid tv sites like netflix but they do not have a app so you stream straight from the site like form you tube. Guess What-it is not able to open video...Flash or java or codecs missing??? ABC.COM -we tried to watch "REVENGE" series-haha,bad decision. After 10 attempts it loaded some of the video but then started to break and preload every 5-6 seconds for about 10-15 sec each time! (my network is comcast 50 MBps). Browser is somewhat worst than my HTC ONE smartphone. On the HTC I can stream online videos from lets say drundoo.com but the samsung CAN NOT!!!Navigating between the sceen menues is slow so after you click at the remote the action is done after a second or two and at that time you already pressed second time the whatever button and of course everything gets messed up! (the tv is with the latest software after prompt me for update at the first start after the unboxing. ) You are very restricted about the apps-samsung market consist of literally 40-50 apps. most of them are useless.Design : 5 stars. looks hi end on my tv entertaiment center along with all my black hi fi and video components. the stand is stable and nice. it is very slim looking from aside.ill update my review after watching 3D movie since I haven't yet.In conclusion- if you going to buy it make sure you are VEEERRRYYY Patient with it...!!! Price is good overallUPDATE OF 03.05.14WHERE TO START FIRST???!!!im sooo fed up of this unit...sooo sloow and alot of pages did not work or you scroll up and after 10 seconds the page will move 1 line and the block for like another 10 sec....soo dissapoined! Will use it for big screen from now on becouse the picture is nice,conecting it to my pc or just for cable tv.....this is with the latest update software of 2014...getting worst only!Btw how this tv got oveall 4 1/2 stars? Be aware of many paid reviews !

Reviews.Title: Samsung 3 D Smart T V.
Reviews.Author: Ken Lambert
Reviews.Content: I like the T V just fine although I have not as yet learned all of the features. I am concerned that with the new products coming out will force the price I paid to be higher than it should have been. Over all , I am very satisfied with my purchase. After looking at other 3-D Smart TV's I am convinced that this is the best value for the Money. I would like to find less expensive 3-D movies somewhere. They are quite expensive.

Reviews.Title: Greatly impressed.
Reviews.Author: Preacherman
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a 40 inch Smart Samsung last January and had a difficult time setting it up resulting in having to have Comcast send out someone to help. The 6400 seems to have eliminated the bugs I experienced in January. This TV recognized my internet and I was able to log on quickly even using the monitor keyboard which has improved greatly. I upgraded the software and firmware easily. The install seemed fairly intuitive. I did try to access the e-manual on line but for some reason couldn't open it or download it. I really didn't need it although I would have liked to browse through it. I attached a logitech mouse with a dangle in the USB port. It was recognized immediately. I tried to use bluetooth to connect my Apple bluetooth keyboard but could not, possibly because I really did not know how to do it and was also reluctant to surrender it to the TV when I use it with my iMac most of the time. I may buy a cheap logitech keyboard if I start to use the internet on the TV. Comcast assisted me by phone to connect the new cable box and remote. The rest was easily handled by the Samsung software. The only app I currently use is Netflix and it works perfectly. I would rarely use 3D but plan to explore it. I found the Samsung remote to be one of the best I have seen. It is far in advance of any of the other six remotes I have around the house including Logitech's. Needless to say the picture is excellent and the adjustments are easily accessible from the menu on the remote. I have not had time to tap into some of the other features of this TV but have great expectations.  I have a number of TVs, bigger and smaller. This is by far the best I have ever had.

Reviews.Title: this tv is the bomb
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: This tv is so feature rich, it has evertything you could want and more. The dual core processor means it powers up nice and quick and apps are super responsive. It plays very nicely with my Samsung Galaxy S4 :-)

Reviews.Title: Disappointed beyond words to describe...
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: EDIT****I just realized that this was not bought through the company I originally wrote down here...my apologies to that company. This tv was bought through Amazon Warehouse. (All the more disgraceful.)I bought this through "Amazon Warehouse" who advertized it as New condition. They marked it that they had contacted me for delivery, when they had not contacted me, by phone, email, or otherwise. I had to inquire with them because it had been over a week, and still had not been shipped-out. When it finally did arrive, they calling twice to reschedule the appointment for delivery, then missed the time they had requested to deliver it by a couple of hours. They eventually showed up, right before I had to leave to pick up my kids from school. They were supposed to have delivered it between 8-11 am and they finally delivered it around 2:30.Their idea of "White Glove" delivery, evidently, is to drop the box in the living room, and then come back and have me sign some paperwork. I don't see what the "White Glove" is all about, that's barely more than what Fedex or UPS will do. They did not offer to open the box, or even mention to me if I want to open the box. If they had, I would have noticed that the screen is scratched (center-bottom) (This is a "New" TV???), and there were two fairly sizable pieces broken off on the bottom right-hand corner of the Frame, which I cut my finger on and bled profusely cause I am on blood thinners. I saw the pieces at the bottom after I took it out.I do not understand the concept of "White Glove" or "Enhanced delivery." Neither one was adhered to as far as I can tell.I am debating if I should return this product, as it is quite dangerous with the sharp edges like that.They should NOT list their Item as One-Day ship, when they have no intention of shipping it out within a week, I do not find that ethical.

Reviews.Title: Mad and sadly
Reviews.Author: jimmydo
Reviews.Content: very nice picture love it, but one thing is bothering me was there had red and blue dot on the screen ;(. i ordered a new tv not refurbish one wat the heck. they gave me a junk tvi hated when happened like this.i will going to make a replacement for a new one

Reviews.Title: Great image quality in 60" TV..!!
Reviews.Author: andres
Reviews.Content: I can star saying that the amazon customer service is excellent, no complaint about shopping process , shipping and delivery... everything was on time... great..!!!About the TV, it takes a couple days to set up the colors, microdiming works ok, it depends of your eye, the same with the 3D...  depends how you want to use it. Internet is fast depending your internet  service, Tv image is great in HD, blu rays picture nice, love the remote control, even if I only used for the TV, the rest of the entertainment system is setting up with my Onkyo receiver.My advice is if you already spend some dollars in this TV, get a good quality accessories, HDMI cables to get 100% of image and sound, don't forget a surge protection just in case.!!Overall good TV you will be happy as I'm..!!! ;)Short update..!!After start using Monster HDMI cables the picture is even better...my advise, if you want the 100% of the picture spend a little extra in good cables..!! ;)

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Kabongo
Reviews.Content: It is great. I real like, quality is pretty good. The experience is wonderfull. I din'd regret to buy. I recomend to buy this iten

Reviews.Title: Was NOT what I expected!!!
Reviews.Author: MLC1016
Reviews.Content: I'm usually a Sony guy but since they didn't have any 120hz TVs @ my price range I figured I'd go w/ Sammy this time. The tv is really nice but I received a defective unit. The top third of it actually lights up dimmer than the bottom rest. Weird right? Oh well. Just returned it so I can get my money back. I'll just stick w/ Sony. My review woulda been 1 star if the tv itself wasn't nice but it was. However the 3D-Glasses were cheap and they don't fold when you're not using them and the remote control was not what I expected with the touch portion. Shoulda just came with a normal remote. Oh well.

Reviews.Title: ok not all the hype
Reviews.Author: N. Barry
Reviews.Content: Tv worked good for a week n half then started to turn on and off...took it for repair to find out it came with a faulty battery pack

Reviews.Title: Good screen but too complicated and no directions
Reviews.Author: Bryan I. Johnson
Reviews.Content: the video is good for this tv.  But there are no directions on how to make this a "smart" tv.  The remote is very slippery and has fallen on the ground a few times, luckily so far it hasn't broke.  The 3-d is good but my most frustrating thing is they don't tell you how to make it Smart

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG: Terrible customer support
Reviews.Author: D. Zander
Reviews.Content: Will NEVER buy SAMSUNG again. Furious. Went to assemble the tv to the base and the 8 metric screws were not there. I looked for twenty minutes thinking they might be in the packaging somewhere, no luck. I called the number on the users manual and spoke to customer service. I told them the problem and they said I needed to send them proof of purchase before they will send me the screws. I told them that was unacceptable and asked to speak to a manager. !5 minutes later, a half hour total on the phone, and the manager picks up. He tells me it's company policy to require proof of purchase before they will send any replacement "accessories". I told him my $1200 TV was laying on the floor and he expects me to jump through hoops to get them to send the little bag of screws that should have been in the box?? He kept saying it's company policy. Well, listen up SAMSUNG... you need to enable your customer service people to be able to actually service people. Major fail. Off to home depot to spend a couple more hours of my apparently unimportant time...

Reviews.Title: Great TV purchase
Reviews.Author: Craig Scholz
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 3D tv is top of the line. We have enjoyed it now for 45 days. I would not hesistate to purchase another Samsung TV

Reviews.Title: Amazing Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Wroten McQuirter
Reviews.Content: This deal is really great I enjoy watching it and everything else does. I would highly suggest is TV for anyone who likes HDTV

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Christina M Meisenhelter
Reviews.Content: Shipping was good. Tv not as crisp as expected even after adjusting to recommendations. Called cable company to upgrade to the box to hd. Will see if that helps. Love having a smart tv and streaming amazon prime free movies and listening to pandora, although sometimes it stops mid movie and has to think before continuing. Gets annoying but this is the Internet connection not the tv so I will upgrade my Internet speed and see if that helps. I'm trying to research a good blu ray player to be able to upgrade and utilize the 3d capabilities but need to figure out which surround sound/blu ray combo to go with. It's a work in progress!

Reviews.Title: If you care about audio, look elsewhere
Reviews.Author: Sarah Hunt
Reviews.Content: This TV is a pain in the ass.** Read this if you care about the sound output **My biggest complaint? The SMART hub doesn't output audio in 5.1 surround sound. This is absolutely ridiculous -- my primary motivator for buying this TV was the picture and having Netflix, Amazon Prime and Pandora baked right in. The audio from the SMART apps is HORRIBLE! This is a known issue with these TVs and it doesn't look like there's an update in sight. This thread can describe it better than I can: [...]. Do read this before considering your purchase, the audio from the SMART apps is almost inaudible to the point where I can't even use these apps to listen to audio or video. The sound is too garbled.About the picture:When I first set it up I had to spend hours looking up the optimal settings to get rid of the soap opera effect. When adjusting the picture settings you get this ridiculous grey overlay which covers the picture as you adjust the settings so you can't even see the changes you're making. You literally have to exit the settings to see your change then navigate back into the setting you're trying to perfect. For a TV with dozens of picture settings you can see how this would be tedious.The picture is decent once you magically find the perfect settings. Not close to what I was expecting though.At the end of the day you could probably spend $400 less than the cost of this for a model that'll give you the same picture with less hassle. I suggest you look around, I'll likely be returning this.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and 3d effects but beware.
Reviews.Author: David Ortega
Reviews.Content: This Tv was an upgrade from my fluorescent tube Samsung, I really liked the tv but it severely strained my eyes to the point I couldnt even watch it. No amount of backlight adjustment contrast adjustment (etc) helped. I had to return it. Led tvs are way too bright for my eyes.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I hoped
Reviews.Author: Jake Salmon
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV, upgrading from a 46 inch 60hz LCD Samsung. I was excited about going to LED and 120hz, but honestly this has been disappointing. The picture is fantastic. Better in every way than my LCD. But the refresh rate seems worse. When I play some video games, it seems to lag whenever something is happening quickly. That never happened on my 60hz. When watching sports, the ball seems to teleport across the screen as opposed to moving smoothly. The brightness also seems to change midgame. When going to dark areas, the picture is almost pitch black. When going to bright areas, it is abnormally bright. It seems to take things to the extreme. The sound is fine, and Blu-Rays look amazing. All in all it's not a bad TV, but for that price, I expected something better.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Minh Tonthat
Reviews.Content: There are many items to learn and explore from this TV, however, it has been very cold in the basement I'll have to wait for the warmer weather to view the TV.

Reviews.Title: Site said 6400 got delivered a 6300
Reviews.Author: Barbie
Reviews.Content: On amazon I purchased a un55f6400. When I received the tv I didn't notice that it was a 6300 which doesn't have 3d. I didn't think anything because it came with active 3d glasses. I spent hours and days trying to use the 3d feature. I finally figured out that I was a victim of fraud. So, my advice to you is to be very cautious of your purchases through amazon.

Reviews.Title: Don`t waste your money; unless you are technician yourself.
Reviews.Author: Andre C.
Reviews.Content: Definitely don`t recommend buying it.In less than 6 months, the TV already has some blurred white spots on the middle of the screen.Also, the Smart touch control doesn`t work anymore.Not enough, Samsung states it doesn`t provide service if the unit is currently outside USA. Which means I have to wait all period I`m allocated out of the country to get it fixed. #suchajokeSamsung, why worry so much about developing new stuff if you can`t even deal with the products you currently sell. Grow up and try to be a respectful company.Definitely not buying a Samsung product again. Certainly spreading the word about it.

Reviews.Title: I get messed
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: I take great surprise when I arrived, the tv does not work off every 5 minutes. depaso the samsung does not have global warranty, not recommended.

Reviews.Title: love the tv- but it leans to one side and back on stand
Reviews.Author: L.S.
Reviews.Content: I am really pissed. This tv has a beautiful picture, smart features and touch remote work great - but the damn thing leans significantly to the left and back. We have taken the stand off and reattached 3 times. Everything lines up perfectly & all screws have been equally tightened. It is completely distracting that it leans like that. How can they put so much into the set and have such a major flaw with something so basic? I have contacted Samsung and will update this if I get anywhere. I doubt it, when I googled the problem it looks like others have had this problem for years with other models.(If you intend to hand on the wall then forget this review and enjoy the beautiful set.)

Reviews.Title: If you are using headphones while watching TV - beware!
Reviews.Author: yarek
Reviews.Content: Yes, beautiful picture. Yes, 3d effects are pretty OK. But you cant watch this tv in headphones. While muted - this tv shows MUTED icon which is blinking and dancing on the screen. Which is irritating as hell. And you can not get rid of this nuisance. (Yes, I did call Samsung and Yes, I was told that making MUTED icon disappearing is impossible). Why? Why? why? I do watch movies very late, do I have to listen to movies in a, so to speak, regular way, using tv speakers? Do I have to make my family and neighbors thinking about killing me softly? Really?Looking for decent headphones amplifier, so I can lower volume of tv speakers to ZERO and listen to my movies via external device...

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: It's ok, not as clear as I had expected but I'm not sure if the problem is my cable company or not. I bought this TV because I had stayed at a hotel in Boston and loved the Samsung Smart TV , different model, because it was incredibly clear. I have not yet been able to use the HDMI cable as the TV does not recognize it as being hooked up. Samsung has been helpful so far, but I am not as much in love with this TV as I had expected to be. I do plan on keeping it as I was given a great promotion through the Amazon Store Card.

Reviews.Title: What a pathetic company Amazon Are
Reviews.Author: paul Johnson
Reviews.Content: Attempting to purchase a TV from yourselves was a complete diasaster, I thought I was dealing with Amazon UK but you switched me whilst online to Amazon.com, who then apparently switched me to Beach Camera. They sent me a TV which was like an unexploded time bomb, they knew we lived in Europe as thats where they dispatched it to. I had to pay importation duties as this came from outside the EU as oppossed to me buying from Amazon UK which is in the EU. The television itself could have harmed me  had I plugged it in as the voltage in Europe is anything from 220 to 240 volts and you supplied me with a TV that only took 120 volts.I advised them of the situation and from then on firewall after firewall was put into place by your organization. The final stab in the back was when they asked me to pay for the item to be sent back to them. I am already out of pocket and you are laughing all the way to the bank after pulling another fraud stunt at an old age pensioners expence.  Just hope your happy with yourselves

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: We have had this TV for a couple of weeks and we really like this Samsung. The sound is a little weak when using Netflix but when watching television it is fine. The remote took some getting used to but once you figure it out it's good. The picture quality is just great. Our old television was a plasma and we thought it couldn't get any better than that but we were wrong. I give this 4.1/2 stars only because of the sound with Netflix. Have not used the 3D yet.

Reviews.Title: no manual is frustrating
Reviews.Author: Danielle Brooks
Reviews.Content: There were no instructions nor could i find them anywhere.If you can find them, please tell me how to get them.  Very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Not Reliable -- it will fail after about 1 year
Reviews.Author: GS0001
Reviews.Content: This set will fail after 12 to 18 months.Samsung has been shipping LCD sets since 2008 with underpowered capacitors and power supplies since 2008. There have been a few class action lawsuits, one of which they have settled, but as many unhappy Samsung LCD/LED/Plasma owners will attest, Samsung refuses to acknowledge that capacitor / power-supply issue pertains to their set.Don't take my word for it. Search the web for, "Samsung LCD makes clicking noise" or "Samsung LCD turns-off by itself," and you will find plenty of persuasive evidence.There are a few discussions about these issues with Samsung sets on CNet.com. There is a lengthy thread on the problem on this website too. Search for the model, un55b8500xfxza, and read what Amazon lists as the most helpful negative review, and notice all of the comments, which include remarks from people who have this same problem on other models of Samsung LCDs and LEDs. One person noted that they have made this same repair (using Samsung parts) 3 times on the same set.If you are still not persuaded that Samsung LCDs and LEDs are a raw deal, then search this site for "Samsung LCD capacitor repair kit." Note the results. Now try searching for "Sony capacitor repair kit," or "Panasonic capacitor repair kit ..." You won't find any similar capacitor repair kits aimed at known problems for these other brands, and when you try, you still get hits for *Samsung* capacitor repair kits.The fact that there is high demand to affect capacitor related repairs on Samsung sets that people are able to make a profitable business selling "*Samsung* capacitor repair kits" on Amazon.com speaks volumes about the reliability of Samsung LCDs/LEDs. Note that there are generally not similar capacitor repair kits for other brands.

Reviews.Title: its ok but i have to buy a camera to use skype and other apps
Reviews.Author: hassan ishmael
Reviews.Content: you might better off buying the tv with built in camera and the tv that can use the regular 3D glasses

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy SAMSUNG TV's!
Reviews.Author: Just Sayin'
Reviews.Content: *****W A R N I N G*****Do not buy SAMSUNG Televisions!!!  After the one year warranty period SAMSUNG Television screens tend to show burn-in and ghosting with horizontal lines, along with very heavy distortion of picture on right side side of screen.  This problem is systemic in all their LCD's and LED's.  Consumer's have complained all over the internet.  There are even numerous Youtube postings with the exact same problems in my DEFECTIVE SAMSUNG model, as well as other models.  This defect occurs on start-up and lasts for the first 15 minutes of trying to view a program. Then the picture progressively declines.I tried SAMSUNG's Executive Customer Relations Dept. and was told:  "We will do nothing but refer you to a local Authorized Repair Shop."  They were downright blunt and rude to boot!  I feel robbed of $2,900.00The repair will consist of a diagnosis visit, and then another visit to install a replacement "Panel"......all told, another $1,000.00SAMSUNG customer service also told me that their Televisions depreciate at 20% per year.

Reviews.Title: A White Elephant Samsung Product
Reviews.Author: Diamond Dave "Dave"
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this TV or any other product made by Samsung. A little over 2 years ago, I purchased a Samsung 50' 3D flat screen television and also a Samsung 3D  Bluray DVD player. Last March, the DVD player would no longer play a 3D Disc. I called customer service and was told to send it back to their service center and I would be charged $110. to repair it. Now, the Television has a black line going across it. I called the service center three times and what they instructed me to do did not make the line disappear. They then gave me a phone number to call in Wisconsin for repair. I called and the lady told me that the repair would be $800 dollars for a new panel. Needless to say, Samsung is putting out products that are defective and are not doing anything to have quality products. Call Samsung Support if you have this problem and ask to speak to Executive Relations and he will tell you "Sorry for the inconvenience and is there anything else I can help you with"Their arrogance and lying are unforgivable' Amazon, stop selling Samsung products. The consumer is being robbed.. I have had other brands of TV's and DVD players and never had problems like this, These products are expensive and you are being robbed by a purchase of a Samsung that has a short life span and very expensive to repair..

Reviews.Title: Samsung is a very bad choice for TVs
Reviews.Author: A. Damle
Reviews.Content: Samsung products are really bad. My old Samsung TV was gone in 5 years because of white dots on the screen (Bad DLP chip) and lost the red color... Don't buy Samsung TVs.Also, make sure that you understand the difference between Active and Passive 3D glasses. Don't buy a TV that requires Active glasses. Those TVs are cheaper, but the Active 3D glasses are a major pain. Passive glasses are used at the movies.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: the avid reader
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS TV! It lies straight to your face....The TV claims to  be 120 Hz but in reality, the back of the TV itself states only 60 Hz. If they are lying about this, then there's no telling what else they are fabricating. And for 2000 bucks, PU-LEASE!

ProductInfo.Features:
1080p HDTV with Micro Dimming: Best picture quality
120Hz Refresh Rate: Better for general viewing and good for video games, action movies, and sports
Smart TV with Voice Control: Interact with streaming content and the web
TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 36.5 X 21.4 X 2 Inches, TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 36.5 X 24.3 X 10.4 Inches
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN40F6400 40-Inch 1080p 120Hz 3D Slim Smart LED HDTV (2013 Model)
